description:
Find your solace on the road. Built to last and endure the demands of urban training, the Cloudsurfer combines an ultra-soft ride with a durable, reinforced sole. The Cloud series is renowned for its unique CloudTec® sole: EVA cloud pods compress on footstrike, then rebound to provide an energy boost with each toe-off. Reflective details add some flash and an element of safety on pre-dawn runs.

  • Upper is made from 85% recycled polyester with a plush lining for exceptional comfort and heel lockdown
  • Recycled embroideries replace all plastic overlays
  • Antimicrobial treatment reduces shoe odour
  • Computer-optimized CloudTec® Phase cushioning technology for a silky-smooth ride
  • Helion™ superfoam delivers a smooth ride with soft landings and energy-filled toe offs
  • CloudTec® pods compress under impact to absorb shock and provide responsive energy return
  • Thin rubber pads on the outsole provide high traction and durability in wet and dry conditions
name: On Cloudsurfer Road Running Shoes - Men's
